name: Engine
description: Engine assemblies and major internal components for light commercial vehicles.

name: Intake
description: Air intake and induction system components.

name: Fuelling
description: Fuel system components including pumps, injectors, and delivery hardware.

name: Transmission
description: Manual or automatic transmission assemblies and drivetrain interfaces.

name: Body
description: Body panels, exterior trim, bumpers, glass, mirrors, and related hardware.

name: Chassis
description: Structural chassis components, subframes, and load-bearing elements.

name: Suspension & Steering
description: Suspension assemblies designed for load-bearing and ride control.

name: Braking System
description: Brake system hardware including calipers and hydraulic components.

name: Wheels & Tyres
description: Wheels, tyres, wheel bearings, hubs, and related mounting hardware.

name: Ignition
description: Ignition system components including coils, plugs, leads, and ignition modules.

name: Electrical & Control
description: Vehicle control units, wiring systems, and electronic modules.
